page.title: 15A DAY AT MALSIS SCHOOL:2
page.content: On Wednesdays and Sundays we can have an allowance of sweets from the school sweetshop. We then have two afternoon lessons which are followed by a games period with rugby,cricket,athletics or swimming,depending on the season. Sometimes there are school matches which are played at Malsis or at an opposing school. After games we have tea,followed by prep.in which we do work for an hour without help from the teachers. After prep. there is a free period which is long or short according to one's bed-time.In this time boys can work or attend extra classes,rehearse for a play,play snooker or table tennis in the games room,or perhaps just play outside on the fields which are our school grounds. {A.GORDON-STEWART,C.JOHNSON. }
